views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11.

Make buttons a better experience to try with Cabello. Cabello comes with 8 different sound effects and 5 different Haptic Feedback types to choose (other sound effects can be added, check 'How to add Sound Effects' in Preferences of Cabello).

Features:

Volume Keys:
Custom Sound Effects when pressed.

Custom Haptic Feedback effects when pressed.


Lock Button:
Custom Sound Effects when pressed.

Custom Haptic Feedback effects when pressed.


Home Button:
Custom Sound Effects when pressed.

Custom Haptic Feedback effects when pressed.


Coming Soon:
New Sound Effects Packs!

New types of Haptic Feedbacks

Different types of vibrations for devices without 3D Touch.


See larger Screenshots below..
